entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20 except minus 15 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20 except minus 15 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
